method: Pre-heat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4.  Mix all the of the ingredients except the dried fruit together. You can do this in a food processor or by hand in a mixing bowl.  When the ingredients are all thoroughly combined, fold in the dried fruit. Spoon the batter mixture into a 1kg/2lb non-stick loaf tin, spread it out evenly and bake it for one and a half hours.  When the banana bread has risen, golden-brown on top and cooked through, remove it from the oven and set aside to cool on a wire rack. Slice before serving.
ingredients: 225g/8oz self-raising flour ,  100g/4oz butter,  150g/5oz caster sugar ,  450g/1lb Fairtrade bananas (the softer the better), peeled and mashed ,  Â½ tsp salt ,  2 eggs ,  175g/6oz mixed dried fruit
